description: An ancient river of the Peloponnese, east of Tegea, which has been identified by scholars with the modern Dolianitiko/Dolianitis.

history.comment: summary; cleaned up references; added MANTO reference provided by MANTO team; added RE reference; added Geonames reference; added associated modern location, which supersedes currently published location; added ancient and associated modern Names
replacing the abbreviation fl. with (river) to bring titles into conformance with Editorial Guidelines
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade
